#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int num1,num2;
    
       while((scanf("%ud",&num1))!=0&&(scanf("%ud",&num2))!=0)
        {
        if(num1==0&&num2==0)
        { return 0;
        }
        int carry=0,add=0;
        while(num1>0&&num2>0)
        {
            add+=num1%10+num2%10;
            if(add>9)
            {
                carry++;
                add=1;
            }
            else add=0;
           num1/=10; num2/=10; 
        }
        if(carry==0)
            printf("No carry operation.\n");
        else if(carry==1)
            printf("1 carry operation.\n");
        else
            printf("%d carry operations.\n",carry);
 
    }
    return 0;
}
